name: Otter Dive
description:
Playing as an Otter, you lead your other otter friends in a battle against the sea urchins. The urchins attack towards the left of the world to try to destroy your kelp base. You help defend and upgrade your friends as they make their way to the right, where the sea urchin cave dwells. Can you and your otter friends defeat their base and save the day?

-Drag and pull to launch your character.

-Defeat Urchins and gain points.

-Help your friends make it to the other side

-Spend points in the pause menu to buy upgrades such as: Increase your size and speed, give your friends more health, Increase the speed that your friends spawn, Increase your friends movement speed.

Note: was designed for mobile first, but still works well on PC
